PROPERTY
========

## Type "PROPERTY_TYP"

An object type similar to the PL/SQL record APEX_WEB_SERVICE.HEADER and used for HTTP headers and HTTP parameters.

SIGNATURE

```sql
TYPE "PROPERTY_TYP" authid definer as object
( name varchar2(256)
, value varchar2(32767)
```
